summary: "Everybody Wants to Rule the World" is a popular song by the British band Tears for Fears. Released in 1985, it's about people's desire for power and control. The song was a big hit, reaching number one in Canada, New Zealand, and the US. It won a Brit Award and has been covered by many artists, including Lorde. The song's music video was played often on MTV. It's considered one of the band's most famous songs.
title: Everybody Wants to Rule the World
